featured_reviews.review_id: We were very fortunate to have been referred to Laddie and Innova Security Systems by a builder/friend even though our own builder had referred us elsewhere.  Through our research, the valued referral and after meeting with Laddie, we were convinced he would have our backs with regard to our home security and he and his staff did and continue to do so with exemplary representation. Laddie has tremendous technical knowledge, never stumped for a solution and vast up to date product information to always present to us best options. He provided and continues to provide us with step by step explanations of accessing systems/equipment, advised best options, price differentials, set up, etc. and virtually walks us through every aspect of our home alarm system, security cameras and fire protection. This constituted and still involves much time, effort, site and home visits and patience from Laddie and his staff to afford us this education and experience. Often we have had questions or concerns on a weekend and Laddie always responds and has surprisingly shown up at any time of day including evenings, Saturdays and Sundays to assist us. We believe this speaks volumes in addressing his character and the commitment of him and his company in providing an excellent service. We believe that reading reviews substantiates your evidence in the due diligence process, so we realize this and do not hesitate in recommending Laddie and Innova Security Systems. We are confident that it would be a challenge to find a better company for your home security needs.

featured_reviews.review_id: Great professional team! they setup our entire house with Cameras, security system, Cable,  Fibre, central vac. excellent customer service throughout install and after to get setup on using the system. Everything can be accessed through the app on your phone. highly recommended

featured_reviews.review_id: I would highly recommend Innova, I had a great experience and they did an amazing installation. Sam and JD were very professional and Laddi helped setup our security, cameras, and theatre room for our entire house. I can easily access all features on my phone, I'm very glad I went with Innova.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I came across this company through my great friend. Innova Security Systems know what to do best. Top quality solutions is what you need! Technicians are highly trained professionals.
100% would recommend!
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id:
I came across Laddi thru a close friend of mine who was building my house in Vancouver in 2016. After few detailed meetings, my wife and I, decided to hire INNOVA Security Systems for a full turn key project.
Laddi and his team were extremely detailed, explained me all of his work in a step by step process and time it will take. I am happy to say, everything was executed in timely fashion and everyone in my family was properly trained on home automation hardware that was installed.
I highly recommend Laddi / INNOVA Security to anyone who is looking for low voltage system installed by a very technically sound person.
I wish these guys success and for sure will use them in future.
